## AuthenticationServiceOptions interface

Options for authentication service

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface AuthenticationServiceOptions<TUserInfo> 
```

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [getUserIdentity()](./authentication.authenticationserviceoptions.getuseridentity.md) | Gets information about user |
|  [isAuthPage()](./authentication.authenticationserviceoptions.isauthpage.md) | Gets indication whether current state of app is displaying auth page |
|  [login(accessToken)](./authentication.authenticationserviceoptions.login.md) | Method logs user into system |
|  [logout()](./authentication.authenticationserviceoptions.logout.md) | Methods logs out user out of system |
|  [showAccessDenied()](./authentication.authenticationserviceoptions.showaccessdenied.md) | Redirects current page to access denied page |
|  [showAuthPage()](./authentication.authenticationserviceoptions.showauthpage.md) | Redirects current page to authentication page |
